channel.title: Creat a Codex Section?
channel.description:
Can we make a separate section in the landing page for Codex related items?
And why do post titles need to be 15 characters?

item.title: Creat a Codex Section?
item.dc:creator: @shane
item.description:
@shane wrote:

If you want to discuss existing codex content I would recommend posting to #gauntlet-community using the “codex” tag.

The 15 character requirement is to help prevent spam and to engender more consicion with regards to what the topic of discussion is. (Allowing people just from reading the topic title to have a good idea as to whether they want to read the thread.)
